title: National CO2 budgets (2015–2020, mean) inferred from atmospheric CO2 observations in support of the global stocktake
description: National CO2 budgets (2015–2020, mean) inferred from atmospheric CO2 observations in support of the global stocktake

ff-meanyear.title: Fossil fuel and cement emissions mean year
ff-meanyear.description: The burning of fossil fuels and release of carbon due to cement production, representing a flux of carbon from the land surface (geologic reservoir) to the atmosphere

crop-meanyear.title: Lateral crop flux mean year
crop-meanyear.description: The lateral flux of carbon in (positive) or out (negative) of a region due to agriculture.

wood-meanyear.title: Lateral wood flux mean year
wood-meanyear.description: The lateral flux of carbon in (positive) or out (negative) of a region due to wood product harvesting and usage.

river-meanyear.title: Lateral rivers flux mean year
river-meanyear.description: The lateral flux of carbon in (positive) or out (negative) of a region transported by the water cycle.

ff-std-meanyear.title: Fossil fuel and cement emissions std mean year
ff-std-meanyear.description: The burning of fossil fuels and release of carbon due to cement production, representing a flux of carbon from the land surface (geologic reservoir) to the atmosphere

is-nbe-meanyear.title: In situ Net biosphere exchange mean year
is-nbe-meanyear.description: Net flux of carbon from the terrestrial biosphere to the atmosphere due to biomass burning (BB) and Reco minus gross primary production (GPP) (i.e., ). It includes both anthropogenic processes (e.g., deforestation, reforestation, farming) and natural processes (e.g., climate-variability-induced carbon fluxes, disturbances, recovery from disturbances).

is-nce-meanyear.title: In situ Terrestrial net carbon exchange year
is-nce-meanyear.description: Net flux of carbon from the surface to the atmosphere. For land, NCE can be defined as sum of NBE and fossil fuel and cement emissions

crop-std-meanyear.title: lateral crop flux std mean year
crop-std-meanyear.description: The lateral flux of carbon in (positive) or out (negative) of a region due to agriculture.

lnlg-nbe-meanyear.title: Land Nadir and Land Glint Net biosphere exchange mean year
lnlg-nbe-meanyear.description: Net flux of carbon from the terrestrial biosphere to the atmosphere due to biomass burning (BB) and Reco minus gross primary production (GPP) (i.e., ). It includes both anthropogenic processes (e.g., deforestation, reforestation, farming) and natural processes (e.g., climate-variability-induced carbon fluxes, disturbances, recovery from disturbances

lnlg-nce-meanyear.title: Land Nadir and Land Glint Terrestrial net carbon exchange mean year
lnlg-nce-meanyear.description: Net flux of carbon from the surface to the atmosphere. For land, NCE can be defined as sum of NBE and fossil fuel and cement emissions

wood-std-meanyear.title: Lateral wood flux std mean year
wood-std-meanyear.description: The lateral flux of carbon in (positive) or out (negative) of a region due to wood product harvesting and usage.

river-std-meanyear.title: Lateral rivers flux std mean year
river-std-meanyear.description: The lateral flux of carbon in (positive) or out (negative) of a region transported by the water cycle.

is-dc-loss-meanyear.title: In situ Net terrestrial carbon stock loss mean year
is-dc-loss-meanyear.description: Positive values indicate a loss (decrease) of terrestrial carbon stocks (organic matter stored on land), including above- and below-ground biomass in ecosystems and biomass contained in anthropogenic products (lumber, cattle, etc.).

is-nbe-std-meanyear.title: In situ Net biosphere exchange std mean year
